DOC.brief_summary: This application , fund American Association Retired Persons ( AARP ) Foundation , implement Healthy Eating Risk Older Adults ( HERO ) initiative . This initiative address barrier affordability , reduce mobility provide old adult nutritious food usually difficult purchase due high cost ; deliver need food individual home ; tailor food delivery frequency base level food insecurity ; offer basic nutrition education .
DOC.brief_title: Study Improve Healthy Eating At-Risk Older Adults
DOC.criteria: 55 year old old member Boston Medical Center 's Elders Living Home Program : Not currently homeless expect live current residence area next 6 month NOT member Boston Medical Center 's Elders Living Home Program : Not currently homeless , live public housing development , plan live least next 6 month Able understand , speak read English Follows special diet accommodate , ascertain clinical judgment nurse .
